c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hpgid.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |

| 3 |  | hpgid.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |

| 5 |  | hpgid.d | |- ( ph -> D e. ran L ) |
| 6 |  | hpgid.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 7 |  | hpgid.o | |- O = { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. ( P \ D ) /\ b e. ( P \ D ) ) /\ E. t e. D t e. ( a I b ) ) } |
| 8 |  | hpgid.1 | |- ( ph -> -. A e. D ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( c e. P /\ A O c ) ) -> A O c ) |
| 10 | 9, 9 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ph /\ ( c e. P /\ A O c ) ) -> ( A O c /\ A O c ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_hpgerlem | |- ( ph -> E. c e. P A O c ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_reximddv | |- ( ph -> E. c e. P ( A O c /\ A O c ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 4, 5, 6, 6 | #P_hpgbr | |- ( ph -> ( A ( ( hpG ` G ) ` D ) A <-> E. c e. P ( A O c /\ A O c ) ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> A ( ( hpG ` G ) ` D ) A ) |
